search_input:
Compose a sentence from these words: become son came bye feel starting least breaking share woman station year anymore plan passed one ago quite started miss accept ahead forget fine today talk something view bite promise often maybe understand time third high anywhere sometimes wrote want

*become the son she had always wanted, and for a moment, she felt a sense of peace wash over her as she stood at the station, waiting for the train to take her away from the woman who had once been her everything, but was now nothing but a distant memory, a chapter closed, a story ended.  she had started to forget the promise she had made to herself to never look back, to never miss the past, but the view from the platform seemed to stretch out before her like an open wound, a reminder of all that had passed and all that was yet to come.  the third day of the new year was dawning, and she knew that she would have to make a choice soon, to keep moving forward, or to stay stuck in the past, reliving the memories that had once been so dear to her.  somewhere, a train was waiting, and it was time to decide.*
suggested_query: become the son she had always wanted, and for a moment, she felt a sense of peace wash over her as she stood at the station, waiting for the train to take her away from the woman who had once been her everything, but was now nothing but a distant memory, a chapter closed, a story ended.  she had started to forget the promise she had made to herself to never look back, to never miss the past, but the view from the platform seemed to stretch out before her like an open wound, a reminder of all that had passed and all that was yet to come.  the third day of the new year was dawning, and she knew that she would have to make a choice soon, to keep moving forward, or to stay stuck in the past, reliving the memories that had once been so dear to her.  somewhere, a train was waiting, and it was time to decide.
